subject: Thank you for your refinance debt request, we are ready to lend some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$488,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://fastmarelous.com/
